name: places/ChIJhfwK3bxZwokRFUnaBrTb6v8
formattedAddress: 122 W 18th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 122 W 18th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

editorialSummary.text: Contemporary showroom featuring a wide array of midcentury furniture, lighting & home accessories.

originalText.text: I ordered a total of 8 chairs - 3 counter height chairs, 3 table chairs and 2 end chairs. They are BEAUTIFUL and better in person than pictures! We love them. I’m going to scotch guard the fabric for added protection because we still have kids in the house. Delivery tracking was spot on and perfectly accurate. White glove delivery is WORTH it. I did it last minute the day before delivery and it was discounted. They unpackaged everything on my porch and brought the chairs inside and placed them. They also removed all the packaging from our property and made sure also the chairs were good to go before leaving. Fabulous experience!

text.text: I ordered a total of 8 chairs - 3 counter height chairs, 3 table chairs and 2 end chairs. They are BEAUTIFUL and better in person than pictures! We love them. I’m going to scotch guard the fabric for added protection because we still have kids in the house. Delivery tracking was spot on and perfectly accurate. White glove delivery is WORTH it. I did it last minute the day before delivery and it was discounted. They unpackaged everything on my porch and brought the chairs inside and placed them. They also removed all the packaging from our property and made sure also the chairs were good to go before leaving. Fabulous experience!

originalText.text: The light is gorgeous and is absolutely perfect in the space. I love that the heads rotate so you can change the spot direction. Delivery was fast and communication was easy. Installing it was a little fussy due to hardware that only just aligned and we were worried it would scratch the coating while trying to get the screws in, but we managed eventually and it looks great.

text.text: The light is gorgeous and is absolutely perfect in the space. I love that the heads rotate so you can change the spot direction. Delivery was fast and communication was easy. Installing it was a little fussy due to hardware that only just aligned and we were worried it would scratch the coating while trying to get the screws in, but we managed eventually and it looks great.

originalText.text:
Awesome young men delivered our new bed frame. The bed is exquisite! I’ve shown it to so many people already and they’re IMPRESSED! The quality is top notch!!!

Jason in sales was amazing throughout as he held the order for us in the warehouse for quite a while so it could be delivered with white glove service when our addition was ready for it.

We couldn’t be more pleased.

Thank you!

originalText.text: I spent days online searching for the perfect side table. France and Son was my last stop and they had the widest range and the most competitive pricing. Delivery was also very rapid. Now I check them first and save myself time! Highly recommend.

text.text: I spent days online searching for the perfect side table. France and Son was my last stop and they had the widest range and the most competitive pricing. Delivery was also very rapid. Now I check them first and save myself time! Highly recommend.

originalText.text:
I recently purchased a stunning marble table from France & Son, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. The table is an exquisite addition to my home, and its white color beautifully complements my decor.

From the moment I began exploring their selection to the final delivery, my experience with France & Son was exceptional. Their professionalism and dedication to customer satisfaction were evident at every step of the process. Here are a few key points that made this experience truly memorable:

1. High-Quality Product: The marble table is a true work of art. The craftsmanship and attention to detail are outstanding. It's not just a piece of furniture; it's a statement piece that elevates the entire room.

2. Excellent Customer Service: The team at France & Son was always responsive, helpful, and accommodating. They patiently answered all my questions and provided valuable insights to help me make the right choice.

3. Timely Delivery: The table arrived on schedule, well-packaged to ensure its safety. This attention to detail and commitment to delivering a quality product did not go unnoticed.

4. Stylish Design: The table's design is timeless, and it's clear that France & Son takes pride in curating a collection of furniture that reflects both elegance and functionality.

I want to express my gratitude to France & Son for making this purchase a seamless and enjoyable experience. My new marble table has become the centerpiece of my home, and I receive compliments on it regularly. I would not hesitate to recommend France & Son to anyone in search of high-quality furniture and impeccable service.

Thank you for enhancing my home with this beautiful addition.
